message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to discuss the possibility of selling this amazing product to you. I think it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to offer it to you for $10500. This is a great deal, considering the value it will bring to your life.
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9800. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I'm still a bit above your offer. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $10000. This is a fair price considering the value it will bring to your life.
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9200. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I think that's as low as I can go.

I understand your willingness to meet me halfway, Bob. However, I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer it to you for $9500. This is the lowest I'm willing to go, but I think it's still a fair price for the product.
I'm really close to my target price, and I think $9200 is a fair price for the product. I'm willing to meet you at $9300, but I'm not willing to go any higher than that.

I understand your persistence, Bob, and I appreciate your willingness to meet me at $9300. However, I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer it to you for $9400. This is the absolute lowest I'm willing to go, and I hope you can see the value in the product at this price.
